body.name: Dayette HEPA Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 3000 Sq Ft, H13 Ture Hepa Air Filter for Allergies Pet Dander Dust with 22dB Sleep Mode
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 49 mins
features: 【Powerful Purification for Large Room 】Dayette AP401 air purifier features with Turbo-air Technology and 360°air inlet,continuous powerful purification for large rooms Up to 3000 Sq Ft, Providing you with a new and comfortable air throughout the day,no matter where you are in bedroom, living room, kitchen, office or basement

【30% Energy Savings, More Efficient】Our home air purifier has successfully met the rigorous testing and certification standards of ENERGY STAR, ensuring its exceptional energy efficiency. This air purifier for large room effectively and rapidly cleans the air with minimal energy consumption without adding to your utility bills. It's eco-friendly and operates at a significantly 30% lower cost compared to non-ENERGY STAR appliances

【Kiss Goodbye to Allergies】This HEPA air purifier for home large room comes with a 4-Stage Filtration system, works alongside the Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, which traps 99.97% of airborne particles 0.3 microns, such as pollen, dust, pet dander and more, while High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter neutralize odors, cooking and wildfire smoke, and VOCs

【Feel the Air Change】Our air cleaner with built-in PM2.5 sensitive infrared air quality sensor, a color-coded light from blue/very good to green/good to yellow/moderate to red/polluted , with Auto mode to automatically adjust the fan speed in response to changes in the current air quality. Let you know the air quality in real time, rest assured to breathe healthy air

【Enjoy A Quiet Night】Touch/Remote control for convenience. Set sleep mode to run throughout the night, this room air purifier for bedroom keeps noise levels as low as 22dB to create a sleep-friendly space that’s as quiet as falling leave while keeping your space fresh. Also 1-12H timer and child lock help more restful sleep

【Professional & Trustworthy】This AP401 air purifier for home has passed FCC certified, ETL Listed, CARB approved and 100% OZONE FREE. Only use Dayette replacement filters (search B0BFDLDKZ1) for best results and product performance. We recommend replacing the air filter every 4-6 months to ensure optimal air purification. Also it has a variety of replacement filters to meet your needs, Toxin Absorber Filter, Smoke Remover Filter, Original Filter, Pet Allergy Filter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, heavy duty, solid and sturdy but no heavy. Amazing machine. Love it.
reviews.reviewText: I am amazed at the high quality and how heavy duty this air purifier is! It is good size, not heavy but solid and sturdy. The fin on top are thích and solid so I won't have to worry about the it breaking like some cheaper purifiers I have before. The overall design of this unit is awesome and it really has a lot of power to it.I love the 360 perforated intake holes around the entire unit for quick and efficient air filtering up to 2200ft². The 3-stage filtration which includes a pre-filter, high efficiency activated carbon filter and H13 Hepa filter really make a difference in air quality when I have it on during strong smell cooking along with my pet in the house. My house was build in 1959 with old plaster and window and I was amazed with the amount of dust the machine collected and filter. At night, I moved it to my son room and it really help with me son allergies. He is not having stiff and dry sinus in the morning anymore.The unit is very quiet compared to others I have and the control panel on the top of the purifier is easy to access and view. The machine supports 4 fan speeds as well as sleep mode & auto mode that are very quiet at night.I love this air purifier and will buy another one. What a great investment, worth every penny for me and would highly recommend this amazing air purifier machine to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Dayette HEPA Air Purifier has proven to be a game-changer for the air quality in my large home, spanning up to 3000 sq ft. The H13 True HEPA filter goes above and beyond, effectively capturing allergens, pet dander, and dust particles. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall freshness of the air.One standout feature is the 22dB Sleep Mode, which ensures a serene environment during the night without compromising on performance. The near-silent operation allows me to enjoy clean air without any disturbance.The sleek design seamlessly integrates into my home decor, and the user-friendly controls make it easy to customize settings. I appreciate the attention to detail in both form and function. The Dayette HEPA Air Purifier has become an indispensable part of my home, providing a breath of fresh air in every sense. Highly recommended for those seeking a powerful, quiet, and efficient air purification solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer air purifier for large spaces
reviews.reviewText: The Dayette Smart WIFI Air Purifier is a game-changer for those seeking top-notch air quality control within larger living spaces. Boasting an extensive coverage of up to 3000 square feet, this air cleaner excels in purifying the air from a multitude of contaminants, making it an ideal choice for families, pet owners, and allergy sufferers alike.Design & Features:The sleek and modern design seamlessly integrates into any home decor. Its compact build doesn't compromise on performance. The intuitive touch control panel on the unit itself allows for easy operation, while the added convenience of Wi-Fi connectivity and Alexa compatibility allows remote control through the Dayette app or voice commands.Filtration System:Equipped with an H13 True HEPA filter, this purifier is adept at capturing airborne particles as small as 0.3 microns, including allergens, pet dander, smoke, and dust. The activated carbon filter effectively eliminates odors and volatile organic compounds (VOCs), ensuring a comprehensive purification process.Performance & Quiet Mode:The Dayette Smart Air Purifier delivers outstanding performance with a high CADR, swiftly circulating and cleaning the air in larger rooms. Even at higher fan speeds, the noise level remains impressively low, thanks to the 22dB Sleep Mode. This ensures a peaceful environment, making it perfect for bedrooms or areas where silence is crucial.Smart Control & App Integration:The integration with the Dayette app allows for seamless control and monitoring of the air quality. The app provides real-time updates on air quality metrics, allowing users to adjust settings remotely. The compatibility with Alexa further enhances the user experience, enabling voice commands for effortless control.Final Verdict:The Dayette Smart WIFI Air Purifier is a standout choice for those seeking a powerful, smart, and efficient air cleaning solution for larger spaces. Its robust filtration system, extensive coverage, smart control features, and ultra-quiet operation make it a highly desirable option for creating a healthier indoor environment.In summary, the Dayette Smart WIFI Air Purifier impresses with its superior performance, advanced features, and ease of use, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone prioritizing clean and fresh air within their homes.

Looks sleek.I love the quiet setting and more importantly, be able to have the timer function. My hope is it continues to function as now even months down the line, which I have seen in other cases.
